root.name: Math Blaster Plus!
root.description: Math Blaster Plus! is a remake of Math Blaster! . The remake was released in 1989 and teaches arithmetic as the original did. The gameplay consists of solving either adding and subtracting or multiplying and dividing equations to kill aliens to progress through the levels. Another remake was released a year later as New Math Blaster Plus! with updated graphics, and yet again in 1994 as Math Blaster: Episode 1 - In Search of Spot.
